attributes.action: Force CEX to stop charging postage on individual items purchased in a same order
attributes.additional_details:
£1.50 per item purchased no matter how cheap or expensive.
Total orders (for example 5 things ordered at once and charged a total amount) should only be charged one postage fee.
attributes.background: Complete Entertainment Exchange aka "CEX" charge customers online £1.50 per item they buy, even if the items have been purchased in the same order. I believe this is wrong of them to do and petition for this to be stopped and there be a base postage fee per total order placed instead.

rejection.details: This issue is not the responsibility of the UK Parliament and Government.
